channel.title: CVE Feed for HGiga -- PowerStation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HGiga -- PowerStation

item.title: CVE-2023-24838|2024-08-02T11:03:19.253Z -- hgiga -- powerstation
item.description: HGiga PowerStation has a vulnerability of Information Leakage. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain the administrator's credential. This credential can then be used to login PowerStation or Secure Shell to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-24837|2024-08-02T11:03:19.288Z -- hgiga -- powerstation
item.description: HGiga PowerStation remote management function has insufficient filtering for user input. An authenticated remote attacker with general user privilege can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands to perform arbitrary system operation or disrupt service.
